snippet: The country is ignoring warnings and possibly moving toward actually being able to put a bomb on a missile.
abstract: Editorial laments that North Korea's third nuclear weapons test has dashed any hope that Kim Jong-un will be any more sensible that his father or grandfather before him, and has reaffirmed international community's failure to reverse or slow country's nuclear program; calls on United States and its partners to review strategies that may yet keep North Korea from becoming full-fledged nuclear power.
lead_paragraph: The country is ignoring warnings and possibly moving toward actually being able to put a bomb on a missile.
